summary: There are 666 portals that connect this world to the other side. These are concealed from all human beings. Somewhere in Japan exists the 444th portal.... The forest of resurrection.
cast: Tak Sakaguchi|Hideo Sakaki|Chieko Misaka|Kenji Matsuda|Yuichiro Arai|Minoru Matsumoto|Kazuhito Ohba|Takehiro Katayama|Ayumi Yoshihara|Shôichirô Masumoto|Toshiro Kamiaka|Yukihito Tanikado|Hoshimi Asai|Ryosuke Watabe|Motonari Komiya|Reika Kirishima|Hideo Kojima
title: Versus
